result.reason: UX enhancement to allow Enter key to reconnect a disconnected session tab instead of requiring context menu
result.approach: Add KeyDown handler on ConnectionWindow that detects Enter key when the active tab has a disconnected protocol, then triggers the existing Reconnect logic already used by the context menu

attempts.raw_output:
